description: Least nonnegative square root of -1 mod n for n in A008784.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
mathematica: A008784 = Select[ Range[300], And @@ (Mod[#, 4] == 1 & ) /@ (fi = FactorInteger[#]; If[ fi[[1]] == {2, 1}, Rest[ fi[[All, 1]]], fi[[All, 1]]])& ]; a[n_] := Min[r /. {ToRules[ Reduce[ Mod[r^2 + 1, A008784[[n]]] == 0, r, Integers] /. C[1] -> 0]}]; a[1] = 0; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 63}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 19 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 01 2000
extensions: Corrected by T. D. Noe, Apr 19 2007 [The errors were caused by the faulty Maple command "mroot"]
